description: Retrieves information about the type of client authentication for the specified directory, if the type is specified. If no type is specified, information about all client authentication types that are supported for the specified directory is retrieved. Currently, only SmartCard is supported.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The identifier of the directory for which to retrieve information.

nested_items.name: ClientAuthenticationSettingsInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the type of client authentication for the specified directory. The following information is retrieved: The date and time when the status of the client authentication type was last updated, whether the client authentication type is enabled or disabled, and the type of client authentication.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of client authentication for the specified directory. If no type is specified, a list of all client authentication types that are supported for the directory is retrieved.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Whether the client authentication type is enabled or disabled for the specified directory.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the status of the client authentication type was last updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The next token used to retrieve the client authentication settings if the number of setting types exceeds page limit and there is another page.
